hook.text: Satellites can now detect a single cleared hectare of forest within 24 hours.

buildup.text: Global Forest Watch provides free, real-time deforestation alerts to anyone with internet.

discovery.text: AI analyzes thousands of satellite images daily, flagging suspicious changes automatically.

twist.text: The data shows deforestation accelerating even in countries that promised to stop it.

climax.text: Transparency doesn't automatically lead to action, but it makes denial impossible.

punchline.text: Every tree that falls is now visible from space.

quiz.question: What is Global Forest Watch?
options: A free platform providing real-time deforestation alerts
A government agency that plants trees
